bibl.title: The Unpublished Verso of P. Oxy. III 521 and Its Relation to the Recto.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: Edition of P. Oxy. III, 521 verso. Temple account (using brackets), mentioning birthday celebrations of emperors, as well as bankers and money transactions. Mid-second century AD. - Pp. 302-304: Appendix 1: On the use of brackets; - Appendix 2: Relation to the recto.

bibl.title: Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010.

bibl.seg: Gruber Christian-Jürgen, The Unpublished Verso of P. Oxy. III 521 and Its Relation to the Recto.

Paul Schubert (Éd.), Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010 = Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève. 30 (Genève, 2012) pp. 299-305.

Edition of P. Oxy. III, 521 verso. Temple account (using brackets), mentioning birthday celebrations of emperors, as well as bankers and money transactions. Mid-second century AD. - Pp. 302-304: Appendix 1: On the use of brackets; - Appendix 2: Relation to the recto.
